body:
ok, i'll switch it. what's the guideline to pick one or the other? It seems that quotes are more common in the codebase

```
(venv)[andersj@devgpu201.prn2 ~/local/pytorch] git grep 'include "torch'|wc
    911    1822   69467
(venv)[andersj@devgpu201.prn2 ~/local/pytorch] git grep 'include <torch'|wc
    238     479   16250
```
